value:
$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Stain,Face_Pain|Urgh... *pant*$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Just where are you running,
my dear little Veronica?$k$pYou want to play hide-and-seek?
How nostalgic...$k$pUnfortunately, there is not much
room to run between here and the
cliff up ahead.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Stain,Face_Pain|S-Sissy...$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Give up. You have nowhere to run,
no allies left in all the empire...$k$pI, of course, cannot allow you to die
out here, in obscurity.$k$pNo, you must face execution before
the people...to be jeered, spit upon,
pelted with stones.$k$pYou will know the disgrace of being
thrown from the imperial court, cast
down where you belong...$k$pThen, once you understand what
it means to have everything taken
from you...THEN you can die!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Stain,Face_Pain|...$k$p...N-no, I'll—$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|...Veronica? Where did you—$k$pSurely you wouldn't dare throw
yourself from a cliff of this height.
Unlikely you would survive the fall...$k$pWhy do you insist on making this
more difficult for yourself? I already
told you I will allow you no escape.$k$p$EFace_Anger|No matter how you struggle, you
will stand before your people, face
your judgment, and be sentenced!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Alfonse... Didn't that hill... There was
a village there, wasn't there?$k$pBut now...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|It has been enclosed in darkness.
Just like the other village... Not even
Embla's people are safe.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|But we defeated Elm! Did that
change nothing?$k$pIf not Elm, then who is causing this?!$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|Hello, Askrans. I can't help but
notice you are still within Embla's
borders. Why would that be?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Director Letizia! To be clear, we have
every intention of returning to Askr
as soon as we are able, but we—$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|Please. There is no cause for alarm.
We'll ensure you arrive home safely.$k$pAlthough, I do have one question...$k$pHave you seen Veronica anywhere
nearby? She seems to have vanished,
and I worry.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Princess Veronica? We haven't
seen her either. We would help
if we could!$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|Hm... Yes, I believe you would.$k$pI imagine you understand that if
you WERE to lie to me, it would
be very unfortunate. For you.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Wh-what does that mean?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...Director Letizia. There is something
I would like to ask you as well.$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|Go on.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|A bridge along the route you told
us to take had been damaged, making
it uncrossable.$k$pIt was as if someone who knew we
would take that route was attempting
to prevent our return to Askr.$k$pI know coincidences happen, and
I have no reason to believe you wish
us any ill will. Nevertheless...$k$pI must ask you tell us why you are
pursuing Princess Veronica. If you
cannot answer, we are at an impasse.$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|I see.$k$pSo you are protecting her, keeping
her hidden, are you?$k$pI must insist you hand her over
immediately. She must be tried
for her crimes against the empire.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|And if we do not?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Surely you don't intend to attack
Askran royalty! You'll start a war!$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Smile|There will be no war. You unlawfully
entered Embla, and subsequently
went missing. Bad luck, I'm afraid.$k$pMy Directive is ever so practiced
in the art of propaganda... It is
something of a specialty of ours.$k$pSo, you needn't worry; the
consequences of your deaths
will be minimal.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|All forces to converge
on my position.$k$pPursue the enemy until we have
Veronica in custody.$k$p

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What is happening? Letizia seemed
totally different from our last meeting.
Is that what she's really like?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|She told us to hand over
Princess Veronica...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Why would Letizia think we were
with Princess Veronica? It doesn't
make sense.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|It could be the case that Princess
Veronica had cause to flee from
Letizia and she's hidden herself.$k$pSince Letizia doubts our word,
the princess may be close.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|In that case...$k$p$EFace_Cool|We can't let Embla's so-called
"Heroes" win!$k$pWe'll search the area ourselves.
and locate the princess before the
Directive can!$k$p$Sbs150|
